1370: Erkenradis was born in St. Ians straet in 1370.
Got married to Hubrecht at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Trame in 1370 at age 17.
1371: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1371 at age 18.
1372: Gave birth to Wellinus in 1372 at age 19.
1373: Gave birth to Mette in 1373 at age 20.
1375: Gave birth to Yda in 1375 at age 22.
1379: Gave birth to Geile in 1379 at age 26.
1383: Gave birth to Heilsota in 1383 at age 30.
1386: Gave birth to Rabburgis in 1386 at age 33.
1398: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 28 years old.
